Package services

Class WelcomeService

Object
WelcomeService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IWelcomeService
public class WelcomeService extends Object implements IWelcomeService
Implements the IWelcomeService interface to provide functionalities related to refreshing application data and retrieving branch information. This service handles operations such as saving and loading data for various storage components used within the application, which includes user, branch, and order data.

  • Constructor Details

      public WelcomeService()

  • Method Details

    • refresh

      public void refresh()
      Refreshes the application data by performing a save followed by a load operation for each storage type. This ensures that all storage objects are up-to-date with the latest changes and are synchronized with their respective storage mechanisms (e.g., database, file system). The operations are performed in a specific order to maintain data integrity and consistency across different storage objects. Operations are performed as follows: 1. Save operations for all storages to persist current state. 2. Load operations for all storages to refresh in-memory data.
      Specified by:
      refresh in interface IWelcomeService

    • getBranchList

      public Branch[] getBranchList()
      Retrieves a list of all branches managed within the application. This method utilizes the BranchStorage to obtain an array of Branch objects, each representing a different branch location. It provides an overview of the branches currently available for operations or customer interaction within the application.
      Specified by:
      getBranchList in interface IWelcomeService
      Returns:
      an array of Branch objects, each representing a distinct branch.
